What are the available options for mining Verus on different operating systems?

The available options for mining Verus on different operating systems are:

* On Windows, you can use CCminer v3.8.3a.
* On Linux, you can use CCminer v3.8.3a-CPU.
* On ARM, you can use CCminer v3.8.3a-CPU.
* On macOS (Apple silicon), there is no available option yet.
* On mobile devices, you can use VerusMiner.

Are there any GPU mining software options available for Verus?
No, there are no GPU mining software options available for Verus yet.

What are some available mining pools for Verus, and what are their fees?

Some available mining pools for Verus are:

* Verus Pool (5% fee, with fees donated to the Verus foundation)
* LuckPool (1% fee)
* ZergPool (0.5% fee)
* CiscoTech (1% fee)
* LePool (1% fee)
* Zhuaao (1% fee)
* AlphatechIT (0.2% fee)
* Wattpool (0.5% fee)
* 011Data (0.5% fee)
* vipor.net (0.1% fee)
* cloudiko.io (0% fee)

Please note that fees may be subject to change, and it's always a good idea to check the pool's website for the most up-to-date information.
